misc.post: Hello.Please see updated press release at http://www.raydowning.comShow time for “The Real Face of Jesus?” is March 30th, 9 to 11 pm.Thanks,Maria
misc.title: Breaking News – Two Hour Special on the History Channel: The Real Face of Jesus from the Shroud of Turin

history.author: maria_downing
history.post: Dan,Another source for the DVD is http://www.realfacedvd.com/The cost is $12.95+3.95S&H. Can be ordered online or by calling 1-800-598-5137.Best wishes,Maria
